import React from "react" import { useState, createRef } from "react" import edit from "../buttons/edit.png" export default function NoteText({ text, remove, update }) { const [edit, setEdit] = useState(false) const input = createRef() const saveText = () => { update(input.current.value) setEdit(false) } return (
{edit ? ( <>
) : ( <>
{text}
)}
) }
